original_title: Abu Dhabi: A new world theme park capital is rising in the Arabian desert | CNN
article_summary: Disney chooses Abu Dhabi for its first new theme park in 15 years, marking the UAE capital as a serious competitor to Orlando's theme park dominance. The new park, Disneyland Abu Dhabi, will be the company's most technologically advanced and is expected to open on Yas Island in the early 2030s. Abu Dhabi's strategic location, offering a smoother alternative to US travel, is a key factor in Disney's decision.</s>
